short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is very helpful for forgotten people.Bug fixed and added Bookmarks features :)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
To-do-list Dash keeps your to do list and offers a unique compliment every time you open a new tab.
To-do-list is a simple Chrome extension that manages your to do list, greets you by name, and offers you a unique compliment every time you open a new window or tab.The option to set a custom background image, this extension is a fun way to add personality and a touch of humor to your day-to-day browsing.Moreover, you can checked it as work done or not
